title: Shrinkage
creator_credit: Willard Goodman, Nathan Boxer and Protective Films
brief_description: Shoplifting in a department store and how to deal with it. The methods used by shoplifters to distract attention and conceal stolen goods. Precautions to reduce the risk of stealing and the procedure for apprehending a person seen stealing.
creator_credit_for_label: Willard Goodman, Nathan Boxer and Protective Films
